channel.title: MASEM on James Uanhoro
channel.description: Recent content in MASEM on James Uanhoro

item.title: Hierarchical Covariance Estimation Approach to Meta-Analytic Structural Equation Modeling
item.description: Manuscript Summary twitter thread Things I would change Manuscript There is a non-pay-walled version below, but the version of record is available at the Structural Equation Modeling, http://www.tandfonline.com/10.1080/10705511.2022.2142128. Here’s the PDF and OSF repository with simulation and data analyses code in R. Some points about the paper from a Twitter thread I just typed up, and some things I would change at the bottom: Summary twitter thread The paper does a few things I like.
